programme.title: The Librarians (2014)
programme.sub-title: And the Crown of King Arthur (1)

programme.sub-title: And the Sword in the Stone (2)
programme.desc: The Serpent Brotherhood is trying to return magic to our world. Flynn, Colonel Baird, and the potential Librarians must stop them before it's too late.

programme.sub-title: And the Horns of a Dilemma

programme.desc: When the Serpent Brotherhood wants to kill Santa, the Librarians must rescue him and help him accomplish the true, secret purpose of Christmas.
